name: Spiked Shell
description: Innate: Rammus'  basic attacks deal 10 (+ 10% armor) bonus magic damage, increased to 15 (+ 15% armor) while  Defensive Ball Curl is active.
descriptions: Innate: Rammus'  basic attacks deal 10 (+ 10% armor) bonus magic damage, increased to 15 (+ 15% armor) while  Defensive Ball Curl is active.

name: Powerball
description: Active: Rammus tucks into a ball and begins to roll,  channeling for up to 6 seconds, gaining 25% − 39.17% (based on level)  bonus movement speed per second over the duration, up to a maximum of 150% − 235% (based on level) bonus movement speed.
descriptions: Active: Rammus tucks into a ball and begins to roll,  channeling for up to 6 seconds, gaining 25% − 39.17% (based on level)  bonus movement speed per second over the duration, up to a maximum of 150% − 235% (based on level) bonus movement speed.

Rammus stops rolling upon colliding with an enemy,  knocking back all nearby enemies 100 units over 0.75 seconds, dealing them magic damage, and  slowing them for 1 second. Powerball can be recast after 1 second.
Recast: Rammus ends the  channel early.

name: Defensive Ball Curl
description: Active: Rammus drops into a defensive stance for 6 seconds, gaining  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance, becoming  slowed by 30%, increasing  Spiked Shell's damage by 50%, and applying it to enemies whenever they land a basic attack on-hit to Rammus. Defensive Ball Curl can be recast after 1 second.
leveling:
Bonus Armor:30 (+ 60 / 70 / 80 / 90 / 100% total armor)
Bonus Magic Resistance:10 (+ 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50% total magic resistance)
levelings:
Bonus Armor:30 (+ 60 / 70 / 80 / 90 / 100% total armor)
Bonus Magic Resistance:10 (+ 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50% total magic resistance)
descriptions: Active: Rammus drops into a defensive stance for 6 seconds, gaining  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance, becoming  slowed by 30%, increasing  Spiked Shell's damage by 50%, and applying it to enemies whenever they land a basic attack on-hit to Rammus. Defensive Ball Curl can be recast after 1 second.
Recast: Rammus ends Defensive Ball Curl early.

name: Frenzying Taunt
description: Active: Rammus  taunts the target enemy  champion or  monster, gaining  bonus attack speed for the duration.
descriptions: Active: Rammus  taunts the target enemy  champion or  monster, gaining  bonus attack speed for the duration.
While  Powerball,  Defensive Ball Curl or  Tremors is active, the  bonus attack speed duration refreshes.

name: Tremors
description: Active: Rammus creates an earthquake around himself for 8 seconds,  slowing and dealing magic damage each second to nearby enemies for the duration. Structures receive double damage.
leveling:

descriptions: Active: Rammus creates an earthquake around himself for 8 seconds,  slowing and dealing magic damage each second to nearby enemies for the duration. Structures receive double damage.
The  slow persists for 1.5 seconds and stacks up to 8 times.
